comments.body: Technically we might want to list the old repo location and note it is defunct, but the license file comment seems to cover that already.

note: Done below.

Thanks for the follow-up. Looks good.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +29,33 @@
about:
  home: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/dis3
  # The home page specified at PyPi (https://github.com/tomxtobin/python-dis3) no longer exists,
  # however it appears that a new repository with the full git history is accessible at,
